sentences.en: Celebrated opening of the Sustainability Centre at Lambton College in Sarnia, Ontario.
sentences.cn: 庆祝可持续发展中心莱姆顿学院的成立,在萨尼亚, 安大略省.

sentences.en: Considering GM's extensive operations within their borders, the governments of Canada and Ontario have agreed to do their part with an investment in GM's future, and I want to thank them for doing so.
sentences.cn: 考虑到通用汽车公司在境内业务广泛，加拿大政府和安大略省政府均同意出资，为通用汽车公司的未来贡献自己的一份力量，我对此表示感谢。

sentences.en: From Astoria , Oregon , to Yorktown, Ontario.
sentences.cn: 从俄勒冈州的 阿斯托里亚 到安大略湖的约克镇.

sentences.en: Grapes, peaches and pears are grown in Ontario.
sentences.cn: 那里种植葡萄 、 桃子和梨.

sentences.en: In Ontario and Quebec there is a large area of land.
sentences.cn: 在安大略和魁北克有一大块的土地.

sentences.en: It used to be just Ontario employers wanting his services, he says.
sentences.cn: 他说, 以前他的客户大多是多伦多的业主.

sentences.en: Ontario, Quebec, and B.C. are the three biggest provinces.
sentences.cn: 安大略 、 魁北克和英属哥伦比亚省是最大的三个省.

sentences.en: Outside at the head of the line, Luca and Andre Bucci of Hamilton, Ontario are almost to the door.
sentences.cn: 在队伍末的外面，来自安大略湖汉密尔顿家族的露卡和安德路`卜西甚至排到了门那了。

sentences.en: Receptionist: Do you have Ontario Health Insurance?
sentences.cn: 接待员: 你有安大略省医疗保险 吗 ?

sentences.en: Six! Since there were furs coming from other places in Ontario.
sentences.cn: 六个! 因为正好有从安大略省其他地方过来的兽.

sentences.en: Sugar maple trees grow in Ontario.
sentences.cn: 糖槭树(枫树)也生长在安大略.

sentences.en: The Art Gallery of Ontario has the world's largest collection of sculptures by Henry Moore.
sentences.cn: 安大略美术馆是世界上收藏亨利·摩尔雕塑作品最多的美术馆。

sentences.en: The team has three more exhibitions after that, in San Diego, Anaheim and Ontario.
sentences.cn: 在此之后还会有三场在SanDiego, Anaheim和Ontario的热身赛.

sentences.en: There are five lakes: Superior, Michigan, Huron, Erie and Ontario.
sentences.cn: 共有五个大湖泊: 苏必利尔湖, 密歇根湖, 休伦湖, 伊利湖和安大略湖.

sentences.en: This school is registered under Ontario legislation as a non - profit organization.
sentences.cn: 本校是一所安省注册的 非 谋利学校.

sentences.en: Toronto is a large city on the shore of Lake Ontario.
sentences.cn: 多伦多是安大略湖畔的大城市.

sentences.en: Trading securities without registration contravenes the Ontario Securities Act.
sentences.cn: 在未注册情况下交易证券违反安省证券交易法.

sentences.en: We’re going to see your mother, in Toronto, Ontario.
sentences.cn: 我们要去安大略湖的多伦多看你的妈妈。
